about_the_game:
Briddle is an indie game where you have 25 riddles to solve, you can do this alone or with some friends. In each level you will receive some hints that can be found either in images, texts or codes. You won’t receive any additional help, you are completely by yourself.
You should search for info on internet, that will help you a lot, trust me. This game might require some software and a little bit of basic knowledge on image editing, as well as tons of patience and a lot of dedication.
With that being said, I hope you can reach level 25, and for that I wish you the best of luck, but most importantly have fun 😊
TRC

short_description: A wonderful riddle game, where you need to solve 25 riddles with just a few hints. Can you reach level 25? I will be waiting for you there. You will receive some hints for each riddle, and then, is up to you to find the right answer. The difficulty will grow each level, can you reach the end?
